requests.name: Motorized wheelchair
requests.description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

requests.name: Mobility Scooter

Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), requires a seniors mobile phone to stay connected with her family. The mobile phone will help with the client’s situation as she stays alone and has high fall risk, she will need the phone to call for help if emergency happens.   

    

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a seniors mobile phone.  

    

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Manager Jaslyn at 8292 2216. We appreciate it if the donor could arrange delivery to the beneficiary. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn. 
Client was previously unable to work due to gestational hypertension, and presently, she is the primary caregiver for the newborn. Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to fork out money to pay for a kitchen cabinet.

For further enquiries, do contact me at 98598768, thank you very much.

The Domiflex premium nursing bed comes with continuous side safety rails which provides full safety from head to toe. Different locking positions allow flexibility for seamless safety.

Lockable Handset
The Domiflex premium nursing bed comes with an intelligent handset with a clear menu structure and ergonomic design. It has fewer buttons and large symbols which facilitate intuitive operation.
The handset can also be locked from the back using the key provided, further improving the security of the bed.

Durable Laying Surface
The laying surface of the Domiflex premium nursing bed is made of aluminium, which not only provides an ergonomic sleeping experience but also durability. It is also easily removable for cleaning.

Push-and-Ready
Assemble in less than 5 minutes without any tools, all components are pre-installed.
It is also foldable, allowing for a space-saving storage.
